title: The Bard Apts..Gorgeous Newly Remodeled Studio..Great Views!
posting_body: ['The Bard Apartments brings comfortable, contemporary living in the midst of exciting experiences that Los Angeles, CA has to offer.', 'We are located in the heart of Koreatown.', 'With easy access to I-10 and I-110, commuting is a breeze, by setting you minutes away from Downtown LA and Hollywood.', 'This is LA, so endless shopping, entertainment, and dining are at your disposal.', 'We are a short drive to Larchmont Village and Hancock Park, as well as minutes to LA Live, Staples Center, USC, and Downtown.', 'We proudly carry a Walk Score of 94, and are within walking distance to the Metro Rail at Normandie/Wilshire.', "Our chick studio and 1-bedroom apartment community is just what you're looking for.", 'Come home to newly-renovated stylish apartments with beautiful finishes.', 'Enjoy great views, in an amazing vintage-styled building.', 'Some of our homes are equipped with 9-foot ceilings, fashionable exposed brick, and stainless steel appliances, quartz countertops, washer and dryer (only in unit 107) and more.', 'Our residents enjoy some of the best community amenities available in apartment home living.', 'We are proud to feature controlled access, on-site laundry facilities, and a responsive on-call management team, as well as a gated pet park and pet waste station for your furry baby.', 'Check out our photo gallery to get the feel of our community, then call us to find out how you can make The Bard Apartments your home today!', 'To view a virtual tour of unit 108 - studio - <URL>', 'Quoted security deposit is on approved credit.', '-6 or 12 month lease - Six month lease available with $200 surcharge .', 'The rent, deposit, concession and terms listed in this ad is only valid for the actual date that this ad was initially posted.']
